title: Cargo (Rust) build error - linker not found with target armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabi

labels.name: S-waiting-on-author
labels.description: Status: This is awaiting some action (such as code changes or more information) from the author.

body:
**Platform: Ubuntu**

**Unable to find linker armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabi-gcc:**
```
$ cargo build --release
   Compiling app v0.1.0 (/home/xyz/Documents/rust/example/app)
error: linker `armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabi-gcc` not found
  |
  = note: No such file or directory (os error 2)

error: could not compile `app` due to previous error
```

**.cargo\config:**
```
[build]
target = "armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabi"

[target.armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabi]
rustflags = ["-C", "linker=armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabi-gcc"]
```
**src/main.rs**
```
fn main() {
    println!("Hello World!");
}
```

**Cargo.toml:**
```
[package]
name = "app"
version = "0.1.0"
edition = "2022"
```

**rustup show:**
```
$ rustup show
Default host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
rustup home:  /home/xyz/.rustup

installed toolchains
--------------------

stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu (default)
1.51-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

installed targets for active toolchain
--------------------------------------

armv7-unknown-linux-gnueabi
armv7a-none-eabi
x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

active toolchain
----------------

stable-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu (default)
rustc 1.59.0 (9d1b2106e 2022-02-23)
```
